message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm offering it at $20,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a premium for the product, but I'm not comfortable going above that.
Bob, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  To be fair to both of us, how about we settle at $17,000? This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your willingness to negotiate.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $14,000? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my means.
